name: Amazeing Lemons
description:
GamePlay: Find and retrieve all of your lemons before time runs out!

Features:

• Mazes: Don't get lost!

• Lemons: The goal is to retrieve them all.

• Oranges: For every orange retrieved, 1min is added to the timer.

• Time: If you don't find all the lemons before time runs out. Game over!

• Toon: A cute and kind looking world.
